name: Fly High
description: Explore, escape, fight and find your way out! Dive into the dangerous and mysterious world where you can fly through burgers and french fries, huge mushrooms, trees growing from above, floating rocks and flying fish! Everything you haven't seen before and will never experience in real life!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core 2.2 GHz Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD GPU with 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 327 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8/10 Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.2 GHz Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 285, 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 327 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
